descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets into the lane and drops the no-look pass to Kelly Oubre Jr. for the finish in the paint.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo drops no-look dime to Oubre for the finish) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo drops no-look dime to Oubre for the finish

videos.description: Bam Adebayo reaches up and snags the pass out of midair for the steal.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam snatches the pass out of the air for impressive steal) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam snatches the pass out of the air for impressive steal

videos.description: Tyler Herro nails the running 3-pointer as the first-quarter buzzer goes off.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro banks in running 3 at the first-quarter buzzer) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro banks in running 3 at the first-quarter buzzer

videos.description: Bam Adebayo gets way up in the air for the block leading to the Tyler Herro jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam soars for the impressive block) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam soars for the impressive block

videos.description: Jimmy Butler gets the tough and-1 to fall and is fired up towards his bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler fired up after tough and-1) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler fired up after tough and-1

videos.description: Charlotte cuts the lead to 11 after Miles Bridges hits the tough 3-pointer and Kelly Oubre Jr. gets the bucket plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges' tough 3, Oubre's and-1 bring Hornets back in the game) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges' tough 3, Oubre's and-1 bring Hornets back in the game

videos.description: The Hornets cut the deficit to single digits after a monster alley-oop jam from Miles Bridges and a transition dunk from Cody Martin.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges' alley-oop and Martin's slam help Hornets end quarter in style) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges' alley-oop and Martin's slam help Hornets end quarter in style

videos.description: Bam Adebayo makes the nice dish to Markieff Morris for the slam, forcing the Hornets to call timeout.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam finds Morris for the dunk forcing a Hornets timeout) 2021/1029 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam finds Morris for the dunk forcing a Hornets timeout

videos.description: Bam Adebayo puts the Heat up 14 late with a huge two-handed dunk in the lane.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam nearly tears down rim on monster 4th-quarter dunk) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam nearly tears down rim on monster 4th-quarter dunk

videos.description: LaMelo Ball finds a cutting Miles Bridges, who soars in the air for the huge two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ball finds Bridges for the huge slam) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ball finds Bridges for the huge slam

videos.description: Jimmy Butler talks the Miami Heat's win over the Charlotte Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Butler likes Heat's pace in win over Hornets) 2021/10/29

videos.headline: Butler likes Heat's pace in win over Hornets

videos.description: Jimmy Butler drops 32 points leading the Heat to a big win over the Hornets 114-99.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Butler goes for 32 in Heat's win) 2021/10/29 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Butler goes for 32 in Heat's win

videos.description: Jalen Rose outlines why he sees the Miami Heat representing the Eastern Conference in the NBA Finals.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Analysis (Why Jalen has the Heat as his Eastern Conference favorites) 2021/10/29 ESHEET SC

videos.headline: Why Jalen has the Heat as his Eastern Conference favorites
